create_hive_wallet.warning: Your Hive wallet address cannot be changed once created

errors.accept_terms: You must accept the terms and conditions in order to continue.
errors.link_wallet: There was an error linking the account. {reason}
errors.reset_password_code: An email was sent with a code to reset your password. Please check spam and junk folders if you do not see it
errors.retrieve_backup_code: An email was sent with a code to retrieve your keys. Please check spam and junk folders if you do not see it

labels.accept_terms: By checking this box, you accept the <1>Privacy Policy</1> and <3>Terms of Service</3>.
labels.subscribe: Notify me about updates and special offers.

link_wallet.tos: I acknowledge that the address I am linking is NOT an exchange address and that I control the private keys to it. I understand that any DEC tokens sent to an exchange address will be lost

forgot_password.heading: Recover Password
forgot_password.help: You can contact us at support@genesisleaguesports.com or on Discord for help if you have issues with your email.
forgot_password.instructions: Please enter the email address associated with your account. If you have lost your private keys please contact us at support@genesisleaguesports.com or on Discord for help.
forgot_password.success: An email has been sent with instructions for resetting your password. Please check spam and junk folders if you do not see it.

wallet_payment_instructions.heading: {{tokenType}} Token Payment Instructions (Please read carefully!)
wallet_payment_instructions.li1: You MUST use a web-enabled {{chain}} wallet to make payments using {{tokenType}} tokens. Metamask is highly recommended.
wallet_payment_instructions.li2: You MUST have enough {{nativeToken}} tokens in the {{chain}} wallet from which you will be making a payment to cover the required gas fees.
wallet_payment_instructions.li21: You have Metamask or another web-enabled browser wallet.
wallet_payment_instructions.li23: You have enough {{nativeToken}} tokens in your wallet to cover the required gas fees.
wallet_payment_instructions.li24: You have enough of the specified {{tokenType}} token required to make the payment.
wallet_payment_instructions.li3: The FIRST TIME you make a payment with the specified {{tokenType}} token, you will be asked to submit a transaction to approve payments using that token. This transaction will also require gas fees paid in {{nativeToken}}.
wallet_payment_instructions.li4: If you receive an error making the payment, please check the following:

shop.bonus_packs_quantity: Up to {{quantity}} BONUS PACKS may be added to this Purchase!

buy_packs.description: Buy {{promotionMin}}+ Packs to unlock BONUS PACK options!
buy_packs.title: Buy Packs. Get Bonuses.

promotion.footnote: Additional Bonus Packs may be purchased when choosing a Promotional Pack Quantity.
